item.title: Emacs Bookmarks
item.description: Updated March 18, 2021 Most of my code has changed a lot recently. Check updated posts. For each post can update code listed in that post. Keep in mind code for linux and wsl configs will have their own posts, except in the case of .early-init and init.el, which have system switches (to load system specific dot-files). Also note: abandoned convention of listing init lines. Now if you want to find the code, and there is now plenty of decent emacs code, use the search function.
